--- pipe_cte_from.sql
WITH cte AS (SELECT 1)
FROM cte
--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Query{
    With: &ast.With{
      With: 0,
      CTEs: []*ast.CTE{
        &ast.CTE{
          Rparen: 21,
          Name:   &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 5,
            NameEnd: 8,
            Name:    "cte",
          },
          QueryExpr: &ast.Select{
            Select:        13,
            AllOrDistinct: "",
            As:            nil,
            Results:       []ast.SelectItem{
              &ast.ExprSelectItem{
                Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 20,
                  ValueEnd: 21,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "1",
                },
              },
            },
            From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
            Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
            GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
            Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Query: &ast.FromQuery{
      From: &ast.From{
        From:   23,
        Source: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 28,
            NameEnd: 31,
            Name:    "cte",
          },
          Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
          Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    OrderBy:       (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:         (*ast.Limit)(nil),
    PipeOperators: []ast.PipeOperator(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
WITH cte AS (SELECT 1) FROM cte
